name: Snake&Ladders
description:
Snake and Ladders

------------------

Built using Visual Studio and sfml library. So you will need to download visual studio redistributable package if you havent already. (Most probably, you will have it installed as it comes with Microsoft Visual Studio IDE; if not here's the link Latest supported Visual C++ Redistributable downloads | Microsoft Docs)

How to play:

Press spacebar to roll the dice

C to take screenshots

Arrow keys to navigate menu

In every game, you are the white pawn, while opponent is the black pawn

In single player, opponent (AI) plays first. While in the next game, winner rolls first

In Local multiplayer, the server (player who creates local server), plays first.

There is no option to play again in multiplayer. Players will have to create and join server again.
